ygData.subject: Re: RE: Mana Madness
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL.. are you suggesting that you have a +18 Wisdom 1HB weapon??  What do you use? I am hoping to get one of those tarnished morning stars that the undead in
ygData.messageBody:
LOL.. are you suggesting that you have a +18 Wisdom 1HB weapon?? What do you use?
I am hoping to get one of those tarnished morning stars that the undead in Kithicore carry,
so that I can have a 1HB with +Wisdom... but for now i'm sticking with my 2HB Staff of
Observers which is a very nice weapon.. as fast as a mace, higher damage, and +Wis/+mana.
It's only disadvantage is that it is 2H...

I'm level 26, what do you use being up near 50?

-Eachann Bronzeleaf
-Cleric of Tunare, Tarrew Marr

>
> If I can find a +18 wis 2HB weapon, I just might give it a try LOL!
>
> Ailamil Faithbringer
> Silver away from 48
>
>
